title: MCP Tool Definition
description: Schema for an MCP tool definition in mcps/<server>/tools/*.json. Aligns with Model Context Protocol tool shape: name, inputSchema (required), and optional description, title, outputSchema, annotations.

name.description: Unique tool identifier (e.g. getJiraIssue or mcp_atlassian_getJiraIssue depending on convention). Used to match mcp_Server_ToolName refs in skills (and docs).

inputSchema.description: JSON Schema for the tool's input parameters. MCP requires at least type and properties.

description.description: Human-readable description of what the tool does.

title.description: Optional short display name for the tool.

outputSchema.description: Optional JSON Schema for the tool's output (MCP).

annotations.description: Optional MCP annotations: readOnlyHint, destructiveHint, idempotentHint.
